articles.description: Frontline workers across the country are getting their hands on some Crocs many others cannot.

articles.author: Marc Hogan
articles.title: Ariel Pink Abuse Allegations Surface in Court Case - Pitchfork
articles.description: Pink has been denied restraining orders against his ex, Charlotte Ercoli Coe, who he claims was attempting to blackmail him. Coe alleges that Pink was physically and sexually abusive.
articles.content: I began dating [Pink] in 2015, when I was 19 and [Pink] was 38, the declaration by Coe continued. It was a tumultuous relationship, characterized by a power imbalance: [Pink] was 19 years older than … [+4701 chars]

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A Dolly Parton statue may be erected at the Tennessee Capitol - CNN
articles.description: A state representative proposed erecting a Dolly Parton statue that will sit on the Tennessee Capitol grounds "to recognize her for all she has contributed to this state." If it's commissioned, the Parton sculpture will face the historic Ryman Auditorium.

articles.title: Macaulay Culkin supports removing Trump cameo from ‘Home Alone 2’ - syracuse.com
articles.description: "Bravo," the actor wrote of an edited scene without the president.
articles.content:
Macaulay Culkin has voiced his support for removing President Donald Trumps cameo from the 1992 movie Home Alone 2: Lost in New York.

articles.author: Rob Demovsky
articles.title: Aaron Rodgers has just 89 picks in 6,587 passes -- and he hates every one of them - ESPN
articles.description: Aaron Rodgers, the only member of the 400-TD-pass club with fewer than 100 interceptions, remembers just about every pick he's ever thrown. ESPN put his recall ability to the test.
articles.content: GREEN BAY, Wis. -- It's not an arduous task to watch all of Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers' career interceptions. There are only 89 of them over 16 NFL regular seasons, and the technolog… [+14405 chars]

articles.title: YFN Lucci turns himself in to police - 11Alive
articles.description: The rapper was wanted in connection with an Atlanta murder investigation.

articles.author: Erin Carson
articles.title: Sea shanties are all over TikTok. Here's why - CNET
articles.description: From Wellerman to Drunken Sailor, sea shanties are attracting the attention of landlubber TikTokers. "It went wild. I don't really know what happened," says the guy at the center of it all.
articles.content:
If the Wellerman doesn't arrive soon, they'll be out of rum. 
Getty Images
